organizations: Weekly Blitz Luke Matheson & Jason Kilburn
title: ArkansasVarsity.com Week 7 Weekly Blitz
text:
ArkansasVarsity.com Week 7 Weekly Blitz Luke Matheson & Jason Kilburn CLICK HERE TO SUBSCRIBE TO ARKANSASVARSITY.COM 
We are now in week seven of the 2015 Arkansas high school football season, and there are several great games taking place this week. 
ArkansasVarsity.com publisher Luke Matheson, recruiting analyst Jason Kilburn, and Gray's Power Poll publisher Steve Gray take a look at several top games this week, including Glen Rose vs. Prescott, Little Rock Christian vs. Greenbrier, Har-Ber vs. Fayetteville, Greenwood vs. Bryant, Pottsville vs. Dover, Junction City vs. Bearden, Hot Springs Lakeside ve. Hope, Jonesboro vs. West Memphis, Rison vs. Parkers Chapel, and Pulaski Academy vs. Jacksonville. 
Additionally, we discuss several in-state recruits including Sheridan running back Brockton Brown , Conway quarterback Breylin Smith , Greenwood quarterbacks Luke Hales and Connor Noland , and others. 
You can listen to this week's podcast in the audio player below.
